b:includable.b:comment: Add in the high-res thumb for youtube images.

b:include.data: { image: data:settings.image, imageSizes: [320,490], sourceSizes: "(max-width: 640px) 100vw, (max-width: 1024px) 576px, 490px", enhancedSourceset: data:highRes }
b:include.name: super.responsiveImage

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:featuredPostIds) : data:posts

b:include.data: { sharingId: data:sharingId, originalUrl: data:post.url, shareUrl: data:post.shareUrl, platforms: data:blog.sharing.platforms, }
b:include.name: sharingButtons

a.b:comment: Max width is 576, so max size @ 2x is 1152.

b:include.data: { buttonClass: "flat-button", limit: 1, items: data:this.data, itemSet: "data", itemsMarkup: "super.hierarchy" }
b:include.name: extendableItems

b:with.b:comment: Filter out the featured post, but only on the homepage.

b:with.value: data:view.isHomepage ? data:posts filter (post => post.id not in data:featuredPostIds) : data:posts

b:includable.b:comment: Clear out style (needs to be a non-empty string)
Ripple, and show 'keep reading' as the default.
Overridden, and migrated to postFooter. Called as postFooterJumpLink.
We don't display labels on the home page.
